pages.text: When this widget is executed, the $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will turn off its propellers, and fall from the sky. This widget can be used to save $(l:base_concepts/pressure)air/$, as the Drone doesn't use any air in standby mode.$(p)The $(thing)Drone/$ will continue executing other widgets, though; as soon as it executes any widget which makes it do some actual work, the $(thing)Drone/$ will turn on its propellers again.
